response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and unique features, I estimate its worth to be $12,000 to me. However, considering its potential impact on your endeavors, I'm willing to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
